results.title: Rosuvastatin and Simvastatin potentiate antihypertensive effect of amlodipine through vasorelaxation phenomenon.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@Rosuvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ have additive effects when used in the presence of a standard vaso-relaxant drug like @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, which further confirms its additive effect on decreasing the systolic blood pressure of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ rats (P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Ali N, Ali W, Ullah A, Ahmad S, Hussain H, Ali W. Rosuvastatin and Simvastatin potentiate antihypertensive effect of amlodipine through vasorelaxation phenomenon. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2023 May;36(3(Special)):953-961. PMID: 37587704
citations.BibTeX: @article{37587704, title={Rosuvastatin and Simvastatin potentiate antihypertensive effect of amlodipine through vasorelaxation phenomenon.}, author={Ali N and Ali W and Ullah A and Ahmad S and Hussain H and Ali W}, journal={Pak J Pharm Sci}, volume={36}, number={3(Special)}, pages={953-961}}

results.title: Croton urucurana Baill. Ameliorates Metabolic Associated Fatty Liver Disease in Rats
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@ profile in normotensive, non-dyslipidemic, and non-smoker @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (basal group) and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@, dyslipidemic, and smoker spontaneously @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that were treated with vehicle (negative control [C-]), Croton urucurana extract (30, 100, and 300 mg/kg), or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@ENAL@@@).

citations.NLM: Auth PA, da Silva GR, Amaral EC, Bortoli VF, Manzano MI, de Souza LM, Lovato ECW, Ribeiro-Paes JT, Gasparotto Junior A, Lívero FADR.  Croton urucurana Baill. Ameliorates Metabolic Associated Fatty Liver Disease in Rats Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():886122. PMID: 35668935

Ameliorates Metabolic Associated Fatty Liver Disease in Rats}, author={Auth PA and da Silva GR and Amaral EC and Bortoli VF and Manzano MI and de Souza LM and Lovato ECW and Ribeiro-Paes JT and Gasparotto Junior A and Lívero FADR}, journal={Front Pharmacol}, volume={13}, pages={886122}}

results.title: Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency.
results.text_hl: In our previous studies, we observed that induction of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@angiotensin II@@@ (@GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@Ang II@@@) combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration results in a high mortality rate or the appearance of signs of @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney failure@@@ in @GENE_HMOX1 @GENE_15368 @@@heme oxygenase-1@@@ knockout (@GENE_HMOX1 @GENE_15368 @@@HO-1@@@ KO) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Kopacz A, Klóska D, Cysewski D, Kraszewska I, Przepiórska K, Lenartowicz M, Łoboda A, Grochot-Przęczek A, Nowak W, Józkowicz A, Piechota-Polańczyk A. Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency. Free Radic Biol Med. 2023 Jun 10;205():188-201. PMID: 37302617
citations.BibTeX: @article{37302617, title={Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency.}, author={Kopacz A and Klóska D and Cysewski D and Kraszewska I and Przepiórska K and Lenartowicz M and Łoboda A and Grochot-Przęczek A and Nowak W and Józkowicz A and Piechota-Polańczyk A}, journal={Free Radic Biol Med}, volume={205}, pages={188-201}}

results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity
results.text_hl: The abrupt @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@blood pressure rise@@@ induced by @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@AngII@@@ was mitigated in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated animals regardless of the genotype.

citations.NLM: Kopacz A, Werner E, Grochot-Przęczek A, Klóska D, Hajduk K, Neumayer C, Józkowicz A, Piechota-Polanczyk A. Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2020;2020():6340190. PMID: 32617140
citations.BibTeX: @article{32617140, title={Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity}, author={Kopacz A and Werner E and Grochot-Przęczek A and Klóska D and Hajduk K and Neumayer C and Józkowicz A and Piechota-Polanczyk A}, journal={Oxid Med Cell Longev}, volume={2020}, pages={6340190}}

results.title: Analysis of quinary therapy targeting multiple cardiovascular diseases using UV spectrophotometry and chemometric tools.
results.journal: Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc
results.text_hl: Such combination is very useful for treating various @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ (@DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@) including @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@high blood pressure@@@, @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ in addition to its antiplatelet aggregating activity.

citations.NLM: Elsonbaty A, Serag A, Abdulwahab S, Hassan WS, Eissa MS. Analysis of quinary therapy targeting multiple cardiovascular diseases using UV spectrophotometry and chemometric tools. Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc. 2020 Sep 5;238():118415. PMID: 32403073

results.title: Simvastatin causes pulmonary artery relaxation by blocking smooth muscle ROCK and calcium channels: Evidence for an endothelium-independent mechanism
results.text_hl: It relaxed @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ arteries in the absence of stimulation.

citations.NLM: Absi M, Eid BG, Ashton N, Hart G, Gurney AM. Simvastatin causes pulmonary artery relaxation by blocking smooth muscle ROCK and calcium channels: Evidence for an endothelium-independent mechanism PLoS One. 2019;14(8):e0220473. PMID: 31369604

results.title: Oral simvastatin reduces the hypertensive response to air-jet stress.
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces the @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ response to air-jet stress.
